context: In August, the couple attended the <a3_0><a8_0>2011 <a0_0>MTV Video Music Awards<a8_0/><a3_0/><a0_0/>, at which Beyoncé performed "<a7_0><a9_0>Love on Top<a9_0/><a7_0/>" and started the performance saying "Tonight I want you to stand up on your feet, I want you to feel the love that's growing inside of me". At the end of the performance, she dropped her microphone, unbuttoned her blazer and rubbed her stomach, confirming <a1_0>her pregnancy<a1_0/> she had alluded to earlier in the evening. <a4_0>Her appearance<a4_0/> helped that year's MTV Video Music Awards become the most-watched broadcast in MTV history, pulling in <a2_0><a10_0>12.4 million<a10_0/><a2_0/> viewers; the announcement was listed in Guinness World Records for "<a5_0>most tweets per second<a5_0/> recorded for a single event" on Twitter, receiving 8,868 tweets per second and "<a6_0><a11_0>Beyonce pregnant<a11_0/><a6_0/>" was the most Googled term the week of August 29, 2011.
